snippet: The authorities said tests had shown that 28 bodies found in mass graves were not those of 43 students reported missing after clashes with the police in southern Mexico.
abstract: Mexican authorities report that none of 28 bodies found in mass graves match those of 43 college students that were reported missing following outbreak of violence in September; announcement deepens mystery of students' disappearance.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said tests had shown that 28 bodies found in mass graves were not those of 43 students reported missing after clashes with the police in southern Mexico.

headline.main: Lost Students Not Among Bodies Found in Mexico, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Mexico Bodies Do Not Match Lost Students

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Escuela Normal Rural Raul Isidro Burgos (Guerrero, Mexico)
